attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To control unwanted dogs and their welfare this petiton calls on the Government to reintroduce the Licence scheme at a cost that truely reflects the admin charge for enforcement. Exemption for Blind Dogs.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/dog-licence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
